channel.title: Comments on: Last Tango in Halifax. A post in praise of Head Teachers, with help from John Hegley, John Otway & Wild Willy Barrett and Kate and Caroline.
channel.description: Supporting children's language, communication and learning

item.title: By: Michael Jones
item.dc:creator: Michael Jones
item.description: And you being from Yorkshire as well!! Thanks Simon. Are you a fan of 'Last Tango'? Michael
item.content:encoded:
And you being from Yorkshire as well!!
Thanks Simon. Are you a fan of ‘Last Tango’?
Michael

item.title: By: simon marley
item.dc:creator: simon marley
item.description: You are utterly butterly when it comes to the marmite test, especially after what you said about headteachers. Right? OK?
item.content:encoded: You are utterly butterly when it comes to the marmite test, especially after what you said about headteachers. Right? OK?
